fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only communicate in reactions, including in your private channel. If the host forgot to/just didn't post anything there, then like skill issue I guess
- You can't use regional indicators >:(

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit someone. They may only communicate in reactions for the following day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully have a conversation with at least two people.
